text: Planet of the Apes is an American science fiction movie released in 2001 and directed by Tim Burton. It was based on the novel La plan√®te des singes written by Pierre Boulle and released in 2001 and is a remake of the 1968 movie of the same name. The movie stars Mark Wahlberg and features Tim Roth, Helena Bonham Carter, Michael Clarke Duncan, and Paul Giamatti. It was released by 20th Century Fox. ==Plot== The astronaut Leo Davidson time travels and lands on a planet inhabited by intelligent apes who use humans as slaves. ==Reception== The movie received mixed reviews, particularly the twist ending. == Other websites == * Category:2001 science fiction movies Category:American movie remakes Category:English-language movies Category:Planet of the Apes movies Category:Movies based on books Category:Movies composed by Danny Elfman Category:Movies directed by Tim Burton Category:Movies set in the future Category:Movies set on fictional planets Category:Movies set in Washington, D.C.
